name: 呂良賜
objective:
本課程將讓學生了解分析化學最新開發成品或最先進之內容。
This course will help students understand the latest developed products or the most advanced content of analytical chemistry
scorePolicy:
期中 40%(Mid-term exam)
期末 45%(Final exam)
出席 15%(Attendance)
materials:
Analytical Chem by Skoog  et al.
Spectroscopic identification of organic compounds; by Silverstein
remarks: 本學期原則採實體授課方式； 因應疫情警戒標準，本學期教學及授課方式請依照學校網頁所公布之訊息為準： (https://oaa.ntut.edu.tw/p/404-1008-98622.php?Lang=zh-tw)
